tgt_original: sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā |
yena sattvārthamatulaṃ kartuṃ śaktā hyanirvṛtāḥ ||204 ||  anekakalpakoṭibhiryatkṛtaṃ pāpakaṃ purā |

dvādaśāṅgulapuṣpāgramakīṭāpāṭitāvraṇam |  āśvatthodumbarāvakraṃ pradadyāddantadhāvanam ||200 ||  prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||
ācamya tricalupānaṃ dattvā bāhye niveśya ca |  kuśān śayyopadhānāya bāhuḥ(huṃ)
